RankON Technologies Reviews

Upwork Reviews

Clutch Reviews

The RankOn Technologies team successfully launched the project and the company is quite happy with the final result. Though the company wished to have more ideas implemented on the scheduling page, they still appreciated the team’s communication and quick turnaround for all of their tasks.
ShikhaYogastha
The client has been very pleased with the ongoing engagement thus far. RankOn Technologies has given the client a pleasant experience, and many of his needs were addressed. Overall, it has been a smooth transition, and everything has been executed smoothly.
Asfar Rizviasfarrizvi.com
RankOn Technologies Pvt Ltd’s work has enabled the client to get their website ranked on the first page of Google. The team provides valuable suggestions and reports consistently. Their extensive knowledge and research on optimal SEO strategies make for highly effective collaboration.
Steven StoreyCar Inspectors
Around 100 of the website’s keywords have made it to Google’s top three and another 1000 to the first page. RankOn Technologies Pvt Ltd mainly communicates through Upwork and email, establishing seamless workflow. Overall, they consistently deliver on time with excellent results.
Thomas StarksRSD
RankOn Technologies Pvt Ltd successfully delivered the website and accurately implemented the client’s ideas. A receptive partner, the team provided a client-centric approach and delivered high-quality solutions. What stood out the most was their perseverance and patience throughout the engagement.
Kamalesh SomaiaCakewalk
Since partnering with RankOn Technologies Pvt, the client’s site now ranks on the first page of Google search results for several keywords. Despite being in different time zones, the team continues to ensure a successful partnership through an effective workflow.
Daniel SalewskiApple Fostering

Our Happy Clients

SEO

We came across Alok from Rankon technologies through Google and YouTube. While interacting with him I realised that I am talking to a person with knowledge and values . We are delighted to associate with Alok after that He and his team is professional, transperant and follow values and ethics. Looking forward for a long term association with Rankon.
AshishLife Holidays
My experience with rankon technologies has been wonderful, Mr.Alok and his team was extremely helpful , responsive throughout and went out of their way to help us, and helped our company reach many of our goals. Couldn’t recommend enough!
Mokshita MaheswariPanel Pros
Found the SEO expert (Alok Kumar) on Upwork and selected him based on recommendations and excellent feedback from other clients. My website is now listed on the first-page of Google relevant key-word searches. This is due to the online content created and posted in the various online venues by Alok.
Steven StoreyCar Inspectors
Previous
Next

Social

A fantastic team to work with. They listened and understood my business. Then created a strong marketing plan which I was happy with. However, RankOn over delivered. Great ROI. I highly recommend RankOn.
DanielApple Fostering
I would like to recommend Rankon for all your web and social media solutions, they have a professional, quick and very responsive team and your works are done with full dedication within stipulated time. Keep it up!
Hamdan MustafaEsselate
Excellent service customisable to your particular needs, professional staff. I would say a go-to digital marketing agency for all the businesses in India who wants to make their digital presence felt.
Shubham Deshmukhgrowindigo

Website

RankOn and his team greatly guided my daughter in her website designing process every step along the way! They were an highly resourceful team and possessed in-depth knowledge on website creation! My daughter's business has really benefitted immensely from their services. She is receiving more enquiries and calls like never before! Thanks for the collective effort!
Gopal BalasubrmaniumMandy Mercy
Amazing experience with Rankon Technologies. Their whole crew is top notch. I am a plastic surgeon and needed to develop a patient-centric website for my practice in New York. They delivered and some more. The website was exactly how I wanted. They were very professional, thorough and responsive. I asked for multiple revisions and they were extremely patient and nice about it. I would recommend them very highly and have already referred my colleagues to them!
Mansher SinghYou Deserve You
Really Amazed !! Professional Team named Alok, Amit, Ashok (The Power of triple ''A''). Great Service, on time delivery of Corporate Product. Best Wishes for Long Life & Business !! Thanks Rankon Technologies Private Limited.
Vikram Girivaxan
